## Program.fetchMultiple() method

Read multiple accounts data associated with this program

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetchMultiple(accountName: string, addresses: string[]): Promise<Record<string, unknown>[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type       | Description                                       |
| ----------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| accountName | string     | The name of the account type to fetch the data of |
| addresses   | string\[\] | The addresses of the each account to fetch        |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;\[\]&gt;

- The data of the requested accounts

## Example

```jsx
const accountAddresses = ["...", "..."];
const counterAccounts = await program.fetchMultiple(
  "counterAccount",
  accountAddresses,
);
```
